titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Lucy Evans Chew (d. 1974) graduated from Bryn Mawr College in 1918, where she studied English, Italian, and Spanish. In 1918 she married Professor Samuel Claggett Chew.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of diaries kept by Lucy Evans Chew from the 1920 to 1966. The diaries detail Chew's daily activities and those of her family, including travels, work, social events and intellectual pursuits. The collection also includes several composition books, diplomas and a scrapbook of a trip across the United States Chew made in 1939.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Bryn Mawr College: Samuel C. Chew papers; Historical Society of Pennsylvania: Chew family papers.
